room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Turkeyfoot Pointe" by Locked In at The Lakes in Akron
room_description: One of the founding settlers of the Portage Lakes was a veteran sailor by the name of Captain Dissinger. According to local folklore, Dissinger secretly buried his fortune before he died, leaving only a cryptic set of clues behind in his cabin on Turkeyfoot Pointe. The cabin is scheduled for demolition, and this is your last chance to discover the treasure.
